channel.title: @red@, @gre@ (etc..) Colors, how to add them?
channel.description: Okay i want to add @ @ colors to my client, but i have no idea how& i can't find a tut on it either, so if someone could please help it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: @red@, @gre@ (etc..) Colors, how to add them?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Add to client.java

public static String combatDiffColor(int i, int j) { int k = i - j; if(k < -9) return "@red@"; if(k < -6) return "@or3@"; if(k < -3) return "@or2@"; if(k < 0) return "@or1@"; if(k > 9) return "@gre@"; if(k > 6) return "@gr3@"; if(k > 3) return "@gr2@"; if(k > 0) return "@gr1@"; else return "@yel@"; }

This in textdrawingarea.java

private int getColorByName(String s) { if(s.equals("369"))//color code, use as @###@ return 0x3b9af9;//hex code if(s.equals("mon")) return 0x00ff80; if(s.equals("red")) return 0xff0000; if(s.equals("gre")) return 65280; if(s.equals("blu")) return 255; if(s.equals("yel")) return 0xffff00; if(s.equals("cya")) return 0x05f121; if(s.equals("mag")) return 0xff00ff; if(s.equals("whi")) return 0xffffff; if(s.equals("bla")) return 0; if(s.equals("lre")) return 0xff9040; if(s.equals("dre")) return 0x800000; if(s.equals("dbl")) return 128; if(s.equals("or1")) return 0xffb000; if(s.equals("or2")) return 0xff7000; if(s.equals("or3")) return 0xff3000; if(s.equals("gr1")) return 0xc0ff00; if(s.equals("gr2")) return 0x80ff00; if(s.equals("gr3")) return 0x40ff00; if(s.equals("str")) aBoolean1499 = true; if(s.equals("end")) aBoolean1499 = false; return -1; }

Read full topic

item.title: @red@, @gre@ (etc..) Colors, how to add them?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:5, topic:392871”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=490043.msg3583205#msg3583205 date=1303950908]

Just add the color you want in front of the text…

Example: c.sendMessage("@gre@Pretty @red@Colors!");

That will return…

Pretty Colors!

I already know that, i need to ADD Them!
[/quote]

Just go below that, type sendMessage("@color@message"), add what you want… Example: sendMessage("@gre@Example!");[/quote]
What do you mean? can’t you two read? there not there i need to add them, the only type of colored text i have is <col=###>TEXT

Read full topic

item.title: @red@, @gre@ (etc..) Colors, how to add them?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:4, topic:392871”][quote author=mattsforeal link=topic=490043.msg3583170#msg3583170 date=1303949774]
Just add the color you want in front of the text…

Example: c.sendMessage("@gre@Pretty @red@Colors!");

That will return…

Pretty Colors!
[/quote]
I already know that, i need to ADD Them![/quote]

Just go below that, type sendMessage("@color@message"), add what you want… Example: sendMessage("@gre@Example!");

Read full topic

item.title: @red@, @gre@ (etc..) Colors, how to add them?
item.dc:creator: @mattsforeal mattsforeal
item.description:
@mattsforeal wrote:

Just add the color you want in front of the text…

Example: c.sendMessage("@gre@Pretty @red@Colors!");

That will return…

Pretty Colors!
